title: Easier French Fries
ingredients: 2½pounds Yukon Gold potatoes (about 6 medium), scrubbed, dried, sides squared off, and cut lengthwise into ¼-inch by ¼-inch batons
1½quarts peanut or vegetable oil for frying
¼cup bacon fat, strained, for frying (optional)
directions: 1  Combine potatoes; oil; and bacon fat, if using, in large Dutch oven. Cook over high heat until oil reaches rolling boil, about 5 minutes. Continue to cook, without stirring, until potatoes are pale golden and exteriors are beginning to crisp, about 15 minutes.

2  Using tongs, stir potatoes, gently scraping up any that stick, and continue to cook, stirring occasionally, until golden and crisp, 5 to 10 minutes longer. Using skimmer or slotted spoon, transfer fries to thick paper bag or paper towels. Season with salt to taste, and serve immediately.
